metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19216 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Netwide Assembler (NASM) before 2.13.02 has a use-after-free in detoken atasm/preproc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.13.02-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13.02-0.1').
